title: Create Interview with Existing Job Description
description: Verify the creation of an interview using a pre-existing job description.

steps.action: Paste a valid job description into the provided field.
steps.expected_result: Job description is accepted and displayed correctly.
Interview is created successfully, and a unique interview link is displayed.

title: Create Interview using Enhanced JD Feature
description: Verify the creation of an interview using the enhanced JD feature with a job title.

steps.action: Enter a job title (e.g., 'JavaScript Developer') into the enhanced JD field.
steps.expected_result: The AI generates a job description based on the provided job title.
Interview is created successfully using the AI-generated job description.

title: Customize Interview Questions
description: Verify the ability to customize the AI-suggested interview questions.

steps.expected_result: AI suggests standard and role-based questions based on the job description.

steps.action: Edit an existing question and add a new question.
steps.expected_result: Changes are saved, and the updated questions are reflected.

title: Select AI Avatar (Advanced Plan)
description: Verify the functionality to select an AI avatar for advanced plan users.

steps.action: Navigate to the AI avatar selection section.

steps.expected_result: Selected avatar is applied and confirmed.

title: Handle Empty Job Description Input
description: Verify system behavior when creating an interview with an empty job description.

steps.action: Leave the job description field empty and click 'Create Interview'.
steps.expected_result: An appropriate error message is displayed indicating the required field.

steps.action: Enter a job description and click 'Create Interview'.

title: Remove and Reorder Questions
description: Verify the ability to remove and reorder interview questions.

steps.action: Select a question and click the 'Remove' button.
steps.expected_result: The selected question is removed from the list.

steps.action: Drag and drop questions to reorder them.
steps.expected_result: The order of questions is updated accordingly.
